channel.title: Most Helpful Members Section - June
channel.description:
[code]#####Section 4: The Overall Most Helpful Members of the Month:
This category is for users who are willing to help people in need of help. This award doesn't mean that these users know everything - they may also need help from time to time - but they're always willing to give up some of their time to help someone who needs it. Users have been listed depending on which section they have the most influence in.
######Server Help: - [sk8rdude461](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=341531)
######Web Design/Development: - [RSCShadow](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;area=summary;u=446948)
######General Programming: - [Davidi2](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=324294) - [Taharok](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=28549)
If you have any other nominations for future editions of the Mopar Monthly, please [send a private message to Flame_](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=600800) or [send a private message to Ambokile](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=576712). Please don't publicly dispute any listings for this month, instead contact a member of the team if you feel one of them is incorrect.[/code]

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - June
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I removed arham from the list. In hindsight, he hasn’t been helpful enough to deserve a mention this month. Also, Vain has not been as helpful this month as I first though (for the server help section I skimmed through a few topics and then searched for all posts by any notable members, I didn’t notice the gap in dates for vain’s posts).

So sk8rdude461 shall be the only Server Help nomination for this month, I think.

I nominated Davidi2 and Taharok because they seem to be the ones who consistently provide the most help in the sections, above the rest.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - June
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I don’t have support for Arham 4’s nomination, seeing as he’s rarely constructive when he posts and hasn’t posted in more than a few threads this month.
I have support for sk8rdude461.
Vain_ helped a bit in the beginning of the month, but then sort of disappeared from the help sections and returned in the past few days. If you can show me some examples that would sway my opinion then I’m all for using that nomination.

RSCShadow has been helpful, so I support that nomination. Seeing as the section isn’t as active as last month concerning assistance, it is a bit tricky considering that not many posts have been made though.

The thing with general programming is that people tend to help with one thread once in a while. I’ve noticed Davidi2, HcoJustin, imthenull, Taharok and Lin, but it is all spread out across multiple threads.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - June
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

If you have any last-minute additions or modifications to the listings then post here and I’ll change them before publishing.

Read full topic
